text:
Hi Community,
I  have been testing this but hoping someone could assist. I am trying to add a shadow line as in this image to the page here. Can anyone provide guidance?
<https://app.HubSpot.com/design-previewer/4623912/templates/5864046664>
needs a login
can you paste the image
is the shadowline part of the  teapot?
Hi Andreas, no it's separate. The teapot is in a module in the body but the header is where I am hoping to place the shadow line. Its using the vast theme template
is the teapot svg?
"but the header is where I am hoping to place the shadow line." that does not make sense
i would combine the teapot and the shadow to one svg. Then you can place them wherever you like
anything else is a nightmare when it comes to positioning for several device sizes ( aka resposive behavior)

Hi Andreas have you inspected the page? It seems to be responsive already across devices. If I combine the teapot with the shadow image, this will not work because the text that says 404 and the CTA are in another module so it will be split in two
i cannot see the  page
becauce i dont have access to your portal
<https://begradient.com/> I inspected the page and can see the box-shadow is coming from the nav but sure the css to apply from the box-shadow
I found the CSS being applied. Thanks anyway

Hi, should “Automatic cross-domain linking” transfer information about HS user identity (e.g. e-mail address) between domains <http://example.com|example.com>, <http://example.co.uk|example.co.uk> and <http://example.de|example.de>? I set users’s identity on <http://example.com|example.com>, click on a link to <http://example.de|example.de> (with those 3 variables __hsfp, __hssc and __hstc), but Contacts -> user’s e-mail shows only pages from <http://example.com|example.com>. Is it supposed to work that way?
Nice looking 404 page

<@UEPK9P37T> It's my understanding that this Checkout Abandoned stage is a HubSpot default. Yes, we have the ecomm bridge setup. I'm still not sure how to set the contacts status as "checkout abandoned" because that stage doesn't show when I view a contact that should be abandoned. Any ideas?
just adding that you can in fact do this if you ping the cname given to you by HS and use that IP in your hosts.

Hey All (more for those on the HubSpot Dev team)! I have a question, we have a campaign with a large set of blog articles attached (3k+), we want to change the campaign on all of these to another one. I know normally this is not something that can be done in bulk by us, but is this something we can have migrated by folks who work at HubSpot?
well HubSpot friends - I got back from paternity leave today and was laid off immediately :disappointed: floored right now
oh man, so sorry to hear that.
me too, but this slack channel might be a good oportunity to  change it. After all there are a lot of agencies looking to expand, right?
very true, post a brief bit about yourself in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> and update your LinkedIn, I’m sure someone out there is looking
maybe someone who is reading this thread is searching
Is that legal?
But congrats on the new addition to your family.

Not a lawyer, so don’t go quoting me. I think with lay offs the rules are laxer though, because a layoff means the fault(reduced cashflow or reduced need for the position) is with the company not the employee.

Congratulations on the baby as well.
Hey Luke, trying to be able to essentially use smart content to show a form only for direct traffic.
thanks everyone! off to jobs it is. it would be cool if i could keep working in HubSpot
Feel like I should be able to do something like this, I just don’t know the syntax
Sorry to hear that <@UDC6ATL20>… Super lame.
Hey all. I am having an issue where Lastpaass doesnt want fill out an HS form
I'd cross-post this in <#CES6JU0RY|drag-drop-email-beta> <@UEPK9P37T>

Ahh, got it. I'm not a developer = I can't give you a great answer for how to do this with HubL.
One way you could accomplish this is to:
 - add a rich text module
 - Turn the rich text module SMART
 - Set smart criteria to "Direct Traffic"
 - Embed the form into the rich text module.
Thank you!

Has anyone had any luck restructuring the HTML markup that is generated from the RSS module?

I’m attempting to add this the footer of my website and hoping to move the feature image above the content and also wrap it in an <a> to make it link to the post.

I’m able to use CSS to position the image but it still creates challenges.

Any ideas?
